infos.value: I fondly remember accompanying you and Lord Sterne to subdue the bombs.
If you would like, now is a good time to attempt the high-difficulty quests known as Character Quests.
Though you will encounter many powerful enemies, there are also plenty of rewards to acquire. Please do give it a try.

• Character Quests •
Character Quests are unlocked when a unit reaches Lv. 40.
Units can <color=#00ffff>acquire new abilities</color> by clearing Character Quests.
